Community

Connect. Collaborate. Contribute.

Welcome to our community hub—an inclusive space for learning, growth, and shared innovation. We’re excited to have you here.

Contact

Have a question, idea, or just want to say hello? We’d love to hear from you.

  • GitHub: leadsresearchgroup
  • Twitter: @leadsresearchgroup
  • Slack: Join our Slack community for real-time discussions.

Get Involved

Your participation makes this community stronger. Whether you’re new or experienced, there are many ways to contribute and grow:

  • Share feedback, report issues, and request features via our GitHub Issues.
  • Engage with peers and maintainers in Discussions.
  • Submit improvements or new features with a Pull Request.
  • Refine our project’s documentation by following our Contribution Guidelines.

Every contribution, large or small, is meaningful. Your insights and efforts help shape this community into a better, more welcoming place.

Code of Conduct

We embrace the Contributor Covenant to maintain an environment where everyone feels respected, included, and empowered.

Our Pledge

We commit to providing a harassment-free and inclusive experience for every member of our community, irrespective of background, identity, or experience level.

Our Standards

  • Show empathy and kindness in all interactions
  • Respect perspectives different from your own
  • Offer and accept constructive feedback gracefully
  • Take responsibility for your actions, and apologize when needed

Enforcement

Community leaders actively uphold these standards. If you witness or experience unacceptable behavior, please reach out to us. We are dedicated to ensuring everyone’s comfort and safety.
